title: Weird idea so honest opinions please
body: Just had a random idea so sorry if it's awful.  What if Riot made a little card game or something where we play it with shards, and can bet shards on games or trade them somehow or something?  Idk if this is a good idea or if there would be legal problems, just thought i'd drop it here in case it sparks any sort of similar idea.

replies.body: They're already coming out with an entirely separate TCG and it doesn't involve LoL shards, so don't hold your breath.
